title: My Glitter Castle
description: This pink, glitter-filled, castle-shaped board book with lift-the-flaps throughout is perfect for every little princess.This pink, glitter-filled, castle-shaped board book with lift-the-flaps throughout is perfect for every little princess.Join the adventure as the glitter princess searches through her castle to find her lost puppies before the royal party begins!
author: Lily Karr
